description: at the moment i can display and enable/display the specific nova services using nova-manage service. i think we've to add an admin api extension for this functionality. at the moment i can't use python-novaclient for displaying running services and i can't enable/disable the services using python-novaclient.
title: admin api extension for controlling services

comments.content: at the moment i can display and enable/display the specific nova services using nova-manage service. i think we've to add an admin api extension for this functionality. at the moment i can't use python-novaclient for displaying running services and i can't enable/disable the services using python-novaclient.

comments.content:
This has been implemented now.

$ nova help
...
    host-list           List all hosts by service
...
    service-disable     Enable the service
    service-enable      Enable the service
    service-list        Show a list of all running services. Filter by host &
                        service name.
...
